message.body: Leaving now
Contractor bags?
Ok. Do you think a 5' tub can work with 2x3 knee wall? 54" tubs are back ordered.
Just a sec
2x4s on end. But your support for ledge will be very skinny. Or 2x3 and the door trim gets something else below marble
Bull nose tile at trim. I ax make 2x3 work but trim will be affected. It'll look fine though
I "can" make 2x3 work. Get 2x4 I can do standard since trims gotta go anyway
Ok. Counting hardie, thinset and tile on both sides?
Ok. You need demo bags?
￼￼Drain running way up hill. 4 inch wet bed. Need big change order
Will there be any access from below if we take down more if the ceiling?
Can we build small platform to get slope for tub?
Dan will be there within an hour.
U got any structo?
Also hardibacker screws?
Yes and yes. At my house. I am 5 minutes from having to run out for this job. If you can wait I can bring them by.
I can wait. Be back there in 10
Hey, do u know if they intended for me to leave the keys at the house ? I think it is her set, not an extra
Please send me their contact info so I can manage things and not bother u with little details
You still there? I need to put these tools back in the van.
Van is at my house. I got ply and tile and lumber in it though. Are u using the chop tomorrow ?
No. I'm done.
Can we put it back in your house?
I can pick it up from u in the morning or put it at my house.
I'll be over in one min
Can u bring the saw over at 830?
Yeah, I have to be at Lehigh by 9 though so just make sure you or Adam is there because I don't have keys to that job.
I'll be there a little before then
Ok.
